knimeNode.name: VCFSorter
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node sorts the chromosomes of an input VCF file analogous to a reference sequence.

fullDescription.intro: This node sorts the chromosomes of an input VCF file analogous to a reference sequence. This step is required in order to merge two VCF files with the MergeTwoVCFs node.
fullDescription.option: Reference sequence file should be in DICT format.

ports.outPort: Cell 0: Path to sorted VCF file.
